title: Smart Data Models - ITinfrastructure / InfrastructureElement
description: An Infrastructure Element (IE) is a computing node of the Cloud-Edge-IoT computing continuum that can run different ServiceComponents.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be InfrastructureElement

domain.description: Relationship. Domain to which belongs the Infrastructure Element

hostname.description: Property. Hostname (or internal name) of the Infrastructure Element.

internalIpAddress.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Internal IP address of the main network interface of the Infrastructure Element.

infrastructureElementStatus.description: Property. Enum:'Disabled', 'Insecure', 'Maintenance', 'Overloaded', 'Ready', 'Untrusted'. Current status of the Infrastructure Element.

trustScore.description: Property. Numerical score between 0 and 1 that aims to indicate the trustworthiness index of the Infrastructure Element

containerTechnology.description: Property. Enum:'Kubernetes', 'Docker', 'containerd', 'Podman', 'iSulad'. Technology or container management framework that uses the IE to run containers (so that ServiceComponents) on it.

lowLevelOrchestrator.description: Relationship. LowLevelOrchestrator related to the Infrastructure Element.

infrastructureElementTier.description: Property. Enum:'Cloud', 'Edge', 'FarEdge', 'IoT', 'CloudOnPremises'. Architectural layer or tier in the Cloud-Edge-Iot continuum to which belongs the Infrastructure Element.

operatingSystem.description: Property. Enum:'Linux', 'macOS', 'Windows'. Operating System that runs the Infrastructure Element.

cpuArchitecture.description: Property. Enum:'AMD64', 'ARM64', 'ARM32', 'MIPS64LE', 'PPC64LE', 'RISC-V', 'S390X'. CPU architecture that must have the Infrastructure Element.

cpuCores.description: Property. Number of CPU cores of the Infrastructure Element.

cpuFreqMax.description: Property. Units:'Megahertzs (MHz)'. Maximum CPU frequency of the Infrastructure Element.

currentCpuUsage.description: Property. Current percentage of CPU usage in the Infrastructure Element.

ramCapacity.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. RAM capacity of the Infrastructure Element.

availableRam.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Current RAM available in Infrastructure Element.

currentRamUsage.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Current RAM in use in Infrastructure Element.

currentRamUsagePct.description: Property. Current percentage of RAM usage in the Infrastructure Element.

gpu.description: Property. Indicates if the Infrastructure Element has a dedicated GPU.

gpuMemory.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. (Only if the IE has GPU) GPU memory of the Infrastructure Element.

diskType.description: Property. Enum:'HDD', 'SSD'. Disk type of the Infrastructure Element.

diskCapacity.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Maximum disk capacity of the Infrastructure Element.

availableDisk.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Current disk space available in Infrastructure Element.

currentDiskUsage.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Current disk usage of the Infrastructure Element.

currentDiskUsagePct.description: Property. Current percentage of disk usage of the Infrastructure Element.

realTimeCapable.description: Property. Defines if the Infrastructure Element is capable of real-time processing.

netSpeedUp.description: Property. Units:'Megabits per second (Mbps)'. Current upload speed of the main network interface of the Infrastructure Element.

netSpeedDown.description: Property. Units:'Megabits per second (Mbps)'. Current download speed of the main network interface of the Infrastructure Element.

netTrafficUp.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes per second (MBps)'. Current upload traffic of the main network interface of the Infrastructure Element.

netTrafficDown.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes per second (MBps)'. Current download traffic of the main network interface of the Infrastructure Element.

netLostPackages.description: Property. Number of packages lost from the main network interface of the Infrastructure Element.

avgPowerConsumption.description: Property. Units:'Watts (W)'. Average energy consumption of the Infrastructure Element.

currentPowerConsumption.description: Property. Units:'Watts (W)'. Current energy consumption of the Infrastructure Element.

powerSource.description: Relationship. PowerSource which feeds the Infrastructure Element.

energyEfficiencyRatio.description: Property. Ratio (between 0 and 1) that aims to depict the energy efficiency of the Infrastructure Element.
